name: MARIA 'LA ROSA' LOPEZ
description: Female, 168cm, long brown hair usually in ponytail. Floral tattoos on both arms. Scar above upper lip. Fluent in Spanish, English, French. Often changes hair color.
crimes: DRUG TRAFFICKING, PRISON BREAK, WITNESS INTIMIDATION
dossier: Key figure in Mediterranean cocaine trade. Escaped from prison in 2021 using forged documents. Violent tendencies - has assaulted law enforcement officers. Believed to be hiding in North Africa.
